0.title: Probabilistic ML: Advanced Topics Reading Group
0.content: A community-led reading group exploring Probabilistic Machine Learning: Advanced Topics by Kevin Murphy. Join Us View Schedule .

1.title: 📖 Our Mission
1.content: We aim to create a supportive space for researchers, students, and practitioners to learn advanced probabilistic ML together. Whether you’re just starting out or are an experienced researcher, you’ll find a welcoming community here. Sessions are held weekly and include presentations, discussions, and Q&A. All recordings and materials are shared openly.

2.title: � Quick Links
2.content: 📅 Schedule . Check upcoming sessions . View Schedule → 📚 Resources . Past talks and materials . Browse Resources → 💬 Community . Join our discussions . Get Involved → .

3.title: 🙌 About Us
3.content: Organizers: Alice, Bob, Carol . We welcome participants of all levels — from beginners to experts in probabilistic machine learning. Join our community to learn, share, and grow together! .

5.title: 🙌 Join the Reading Group
5.content: We welcome anyone interested in probabilistic ML — regardless of your experience level! .

6.title: Table of Contents
6.content: . | 💬 Connect With Us . | Slack Community | Mailing List | GitHub | . | 🎤 Suggest a Talk | 📋 How to Participate | 🤝 Code of Conduct | .

7.title: 💬 Connect With Us
7.content: Slack Community . Join our active Slack workspace for discussions, questions, and announcements: . Join Slack → . Mailing List . Stay updated with weekly digests and session reminders: . Subscribe to Mailing List → . GitHub . Contribute to our materials, suggest improvements, or report issues: . Visit GitHub → .

8.title: 🎤 Suggest a Talk
8.content: We’re always looking for presenters! Whether you want to cover a book chapter, share your research, or discuss a related paper, we’d love to hear from you. Topics we’re interested in: . | Chapters from PML: Advanced Topics | Related research papers | Applications of probabilistic ML | Implementation tutorials | Your research projects | . Submit Talk Proposal → . First-time presenters are especially encouraged! We provide mentorship and support to help you prepare.

9.title: 📋 How to Participate
9.content: . | Attend Sessions - Join our weekly meetings (see schedule) | Ask Questions - No question is too basic or too advanced | Share Resources - Found something useful? Share it with the group | Present - Share your knowledge or lead a discussion | Contribute - Help improve our materials on GitHub | . All sessions are recorded and shared for those who can’t attend live. However, live participation is encouraged for better interaction! .

10.title: 🤝 Code of Conduct
10.content: We are committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive environment. Please be respectful, considerate, and collaborative. See our full Code of Conduct for details.
